means: 匕首，短剑( dagger的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: She and her mother were at daggers drawn.
sentence.Network_cn: 她和她母亲之间的关系异常紧张。

sentence.Network_en: I will speak daggers to her, but use none.
sentence.Network_cn: 我要用利剑一样的话刺痛她的心, 但绝不是真用利剑.

sentence.Network_en: The world lives at daggers drawn in a cold war.
sentence.Network_cn: 世界在冷战中剑拨弩张.

PerfectNetExp.abs: the notable exception to this rule is with daggers . because they are normalized to 1.7 speed for AP calculations no _ instant attacks , daggers deal noticeably lower damage with Devastate .需要额外注意的情况是匕首。由于匕首在计算瞬发攻击时按1.7速度标准化，因此匕首造成的毁灭打击伤害非常低。
of a people so refined and cultured that they might settle serious differences of opinion without sticking each other in the back with daggers .他说有一群温文有教养的人，能够处理各种严重冲突的意见，而不必在彼此的背后捅刀子。

list.abs: Dagadip 三硫磷dagger fibre 达格尔叶纤维dagger 短剑
请帮忙翻译几个词组_百度知道 ... look blue 神色沮丧 look daggers (对某人)怒目而视 look up 向上看，查找。.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(D) ... double click 双击 double dagger 双剑号 double deck 楼中楼.
骨矛(Ceremonial Dagger) 用异形的骨头制成,用来进行仪式和给异形剥皮。

entry.def: A dagger is a weapon like a knife with two sharp edges.
If you say that two people are at daggers drawn, you mean they are having an argument and are still very angry with each other.

example.ex: She and her mother were at daggers drawn.
example.tran: 她和她母亲之间的关系异常紧张。

auth_sentence.content: Once again, dealers had the daggers out for Homeserve.
